attributes.action: Save the Construction Industry for the self employed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now you have bailled out the banks now its time to save the construction industry so people that work in the industry can still have a livelihood. Or maybe the goverment will fund our wages in full until the ecconomy picks up?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
